### Government Tender Announcement

### Request for Standing Offer for Fire Alarm Maintenance Services at CFB Halifax

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence has issued a request for standing offer for the provision of Fire Alarm Maintenance Services at the Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia.

#### Description of Services

The successful supplier will be required to provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision for the maintenance, repair, and replacement of the Siemens fire alarm systems and its peripheral devices at various buildings and locations at CFB Halifax on an as-and-when-required basis.

#### Contract Period

The resulting standing offer will have a contract period of one (1) year, with the option to extend for an additional two (2) one (1) year periods.

#### Security Requirement

The contract may require security clearance and may be subject to other security-related requirements. Bidders must ensure that they have all necessary clearances prior to submitting their bid.

#### Tendering Information

* **Title**: W684H-240228-RISO
* **Reference Number**: WS4606006202
* **Publication Date**: 2024-05-27
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-06-17T14:00:00
* **Request for Standing Offer (RSO) Number**: WS4606006202
* **Notice Type**: RSO

#### Selection Criteria

The selection of the successful supplier will be based on the lowest price methodology.

#### Sourcing and Trade Agreements

Bidders must comply with the deemed acceptance provisions as set out in the Agreement on Internal Trade and its repealing legislation.

#### Support Materials

Support materials, including tender documents, may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or clarification on the RSO, contact Sonia Stockman, Procurement Officer at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5 or via email at [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
